overview: Feeling detached from her body and the world around her, Niamh McMahon struggles to remember events from a college party. Becoming overpowered by sudden flashes from the nightâ€™s evens, she struggles to regain her voice in connecting with those around her. Niamh is desperately trying to find some sort of solace in a world filled with so much noise.
tagline: Keeping quiet is like saying it was fine to begin with.
title: Broken Silence
